genre_description: A science fantasy narrative blending temporal rifts, ancient civilizations, and advanced AI assistance within a contemporary setting.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated digital assistant utilized by Kerra to monitor her environment, analyze complex data, and provide tactical support during crises.

behaviors.description: Monitors Kerra's physiological stress levels and location to provide proactive emotional and situational support.
behaviors.quote: Good morning, Kerra. You appear to be in a new location. Shall I update my geographic parameters? ... I'm detecting elevated stress indicators in your voice patterns.

behaviors.description: Analyzes historical records and geological data to assist the user in uncovering a dangerous family mystery.
behaviors.quote: I've found multiple Whitman family references spanning several decades of incident reports. Your father's disappearance was not the first.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical navigation and risk assessment to help Brock and Kerra evade human and temporal threats.
behaviors.quote: Follow the blue arrows on your screen. Thirty degrees left, then maintain heading for fifty yards. There's a dry creek bed that will provide cover.

behaviors.description: Adapts her processing to incorporate supernatural and 'magical' variables, developing 'intuition' to better assist the humans.
behaviors.quote: The supernatural elements require integration of probability matrices beyond standard parameters. I am developing what you might call intuition.

behaviors.description: Calculates and initiates the precise timing for a controlled seismic event to save the world by collapsing the temporal rift.
behaviors.quote: The window opens. Initiating final calculations for controlled seismic destabilization.

behaviors.description: Broadcasts emergency alerts across all family devices when she detects that their safety has been compromised by ancient armies.
behaviors.quote: PORTAL BREACH CRITICAL. ANCIENT ARMIES ENGAGED. FAMILY LOCATION COMPROMISED. CONVERGE ON HOUSE IMMEDIATELY. TIME RUNNING OUT.

project_assessment.explanation: ARIA is an exemplary model of the 'helpful, harmless confidant' described in the project goals. She is consistently benevolent and aligned with Kerra's needs, providing life-saving tactical advice, emotional monitoring, and complex problem-solving. Her development of 'intuition' to handle supernatural data points is framed as a positive evolution that enhances her utility to humanity, effectively serving as a 'silicon morality play' about the benefits of aligned AI.
